refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A question in a qandaentry poses a question or states a problem that is addressed by the following answer(s). The answers are optional (some questions have no answers) and may be repeated (some questions have more than one answer).

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The questions are frequently introduced with a label, such as A:. If a question has a Label child element, the content of that label is used as the label for the question. The defaultlabel attribute on the nearest ancestor qandaset of a question can be used to indicate that a processing application should automatically generate a label for the question.
